## Babe Ruth vs. Barry Bonds

```{r cache = TRUE, warning=FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(plotly))
suppressMessages(library(plyr))
suppressMessages(library(RColorBrewer))
df <- read.csv("./baseballdatabank-master_2016-03-02/baseballdatabank-master/core/Batting.csv")
ruth_aaron <- subset(df, playerID == "ruthba01" | playerID == "bondsba01")
ruth_aaron <- mutate(ruth_aaron, name = ifelse(playerID == "ruthba01","Babe Ruth", "Barry Bonds"))
plot_ly(ruth_aaron, x=~BB, y=~HR, 
        type ="scatter", mode = "markers", color = ~name,colors=c("red","blue"))
```
